trans-unit.source: Implements <xref href="System.Data.IDataRecord"></xref> and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref>, and provides data binding support for <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbEnumerator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref href="System.Data.IDataRecord"></xref>和<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"> </xref>，并提供有关数据绑定支持<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbEnumerator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of fields within the current record.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前记录中的字段数。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The number of fields within the current record.
trans-unit.target: 中的当前记录的字段数。

trans-unit.source: Not connected to a data source to read from.
trans-unit.target: 未连接到要从其中进行读取的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified column as a Boolean.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定列的值为布尔值。

trans-unit.source: No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a Boolean.
trans-unit.target: 不进行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是一个布尔值。

trans-unit.source: The column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 列序号。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Boolean is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>布尔值是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified column as a byte.
trans-unit.target: 以字节的形式返回指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte.
trans-unit.target: 不进行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是一个字节。

trans-unit.source: The column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 列序号。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified column as a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组的形式返回指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 不进行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的列序号。

trans-unit.source: The index within the field from which to start the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 中从其开始读取的操作的字段的索引。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的字节流缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The index for `buffer` to start the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 为索引`buffer`开始读取的操作。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified column as a character.
trans-unit.target: 字符的形式返回指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a character.
trans-unit.target: 不进行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是一个字符。

trans-unit.source: The column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 列序号。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified column as a character array.
trans-unit.target: 字符数组的形式返回指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a character array.
trans-unit.target: 不进行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是字符数组。

trans-unit.source: Column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 列序号。

trans-unit.source: Buffer to copy data into.
trans-unit.target: 若要将数据复制到的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Maximum length to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 若要复制到缓冲区的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: Point to start from within the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中从其开始的点。

trans-unit.source: Point to start from within the source data.
trans-unit.target: 源数据中从其开始的点。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定列的值。

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 当前不受支持。

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 当前不受支持。

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 当前不受支持。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the back-end data type.
trans-unit.target: 返回的后端数据类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 列序号。

trans-unit.source: The name of the back-end data type.
trans-unit.target: 后端数据类型的名称。

trans-unit.target: 返回指定列的值<xref:System.DateTime>对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: 不进行任何转换;因此检索到的数据必须已经是双精度浮点数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>对象的数据类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified column as a single-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定列的值作为单精度浮点数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.

trans-unit.source: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current record.
trans-unit.target: 将填充使用列的当前记录的值的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Using this method may be more efficient for most applications then retrieving each field individually.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可能更加有效对于大多数应用程序，然后分别检索每个字段。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Object> to copy the attribute fields into.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Object>要复制到的属性字段。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The number of instances of <xref:System.Object> in the array.
trans-unit.target: 实例数<xref:System.Object>数组中。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate nonexistent values.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示不存在的值。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to check for null column values before calling the typed get methods (for example, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetByte%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetChar%2A>, and so on) to avoid raising an error.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法来检查前调用的类型化的 null 列值 get 方法 (例如， <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetByte%2A>， <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetChar%2A>，依次类推) 以避免产生一个错误。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetChar%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 列序号。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的列等效于<xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 类型的数组<xref:System.Attribute>用作筛选器。</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the filtered properties for this component instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref> ，表示此组件实例的已筛选的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that contains the property described by the specified property descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含指定的属性描述符所描述的属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.PropertyDescriptor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.PropertyDescriptor%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.PropertyDescriptor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that represents the property whose owner is to be found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> ，它表示要查找其所有者的属性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the owner of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它表示指定属性的所有者。</xref:System.Object>
